DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this randomized controlled trial (RCT) is to compare the two ways (tras-rectal and trans-perineal) to perform prostate biopsy from the rate of Positive detection, complications, pain level, operation time and costs et al.
DOC.brief_title: A Test of the Comparison Between Trans-rectal and Trans-perineal Biopsy of Prostate
DOC.criteria: prostatespecific antigen > 4ng/ml Palpation is positive older than 80y prostatespecific antigen > 100 ng/ml
